config_description: enable or disable keepalive on rpc/native connections
developer_understanding_on_working: The rpc_keepalive configuration in the code determines whether keepalive is enabled or disabled on rpc/native connections. It is set based on the value retrieved from DatabaseDescriptor.getRpcKeepAlive() method.
developer_understanding_on_triggering_fr: The triggering frequency of the rpc_keepalive configuration in the system depends on when the Server class is instantiated with the Builder object that contains the rpc_keepalive configuration value.
developer_understanding_on_size_impact: The impact of the rpc_keepalive configuration option on the system is that it affects the behavior of rpc/native connections by enabling or disabling keepalive, which can impact the performance and resource usage of the system.
